overview: This ghoulish hidden-camera show finds friends and family members setting up unsuspecting victims for pranks in elaborately staged and scary situations involving movie-style special effects and makeup. Volume Two includes: Feral Peril, Gary the Babysitter, Gnome Sweet Gnome, Zombie Town, He Shoots He Spores, I Me Minefield, Insanity Virus, Insecurity Complex, Lab Lockdown, Limo in Area 51, Barnacle Boy.
title: Scare Tactics: Volume 2
